In be1f13107d561f4a9601515aff1d74bdf650bbd7:
> share/pkgconfig directory is a wrong place to search for *.pc files.

Why is it the wrong place look? The `pkg-config` man page says `On most systems, pkg-config looks in /usr/lib/pkgconfig, /usr/share/pkgconfig, /usr/local/lib/pkgconfig and /usr/local/share/pkgconfig for these files.`

> In [be1f131](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/be1f13107d561f4a9601515aff1d74bdf650bbd7):
> 
> > share/pkgconfig directory is a wrong place to search for *.pc files.
> 
> Why is it the wrong place look? The `pkg-config` man page says `On most systems, pkg-config looks in /usr/lib/pkgconfig, /usr/share/pkgconfig, /usr/local/lib/pkgconfig and /usr/local/share/pkgconfig for these fi
I would rather just drop this change (except for the qt portion). I don't think it's a problem searching in `share/pkgconfig`.
Can you drop this change as well.
